ACCURATE.cn:
{{methodology}}是准确的。✅{{image_caveat}}{{generated}}

感谢您对新加坡网络安全的支持和贡献！{{incorrect}}{{submissions_remaining}}

SATIRE.en:
{{methodology}}*satirical in nature. Some elements may be untrue, but it's probably meant to be humourous rather than to deceive*.🙃{{image_caveat}}{{generated}}

Thank you for keeping Singapore informed!{{incorrect}}{{submissions_remaining}}
SATIRE.cn:
{{methodology}}具有讽刺性质。虽然其中一些信息并不属实。不过它们似乎是以幽默的方式呈现，而不是恶意欺骗。🙃{{image_caveat}}{{generated}}

感谢您对新加坡网络安全的支持和贡献！{{incorrect}}{{submissions_remaining}}

ERROR.en:
Oops, we encountered an error assessing this message.

You can try sending the message in again, or report the error via our form at https://bit.ly/checkmate-feedback. Sorry about that! 😔
ERROR.cn:
抱歉，查友在评估您提供的短信时发生了问题。

欢迎您稍后重试，或者通过这份表格向我们反馈：https://bit.ly/checkmate-feedback。对此造成的不便，我们非常抱歉！😔

WAIT_FOR_AI.en: Hello! 👋 Thanks for sending this in! Give us a minute while our AI assesses this message 🤖
WAIT_FOR_AI.cn: 你好！👋 感谢你的提交！请稍等片刻，我们的人工智能🤖正在评估这条消息。

WAIT_FOR_ASSESSMENT.en: Thanks for sending this in! Our CheckMates🕵🏻 will review this and provide the results soon.
WAIT_FOR_ASSESSMENT.cn: 感谢您使用查友！我们的查哥查妹🕵🏻会尽快评估这条短信并回复。

MESSAGE_NOT_YET_ASSESSED.en:
Unfortunately, our AI wasn't able to assess this message.

Our volunteers🕵🏻 will review this and *provide the results soon*. Thank you for your patience.
MESSAGE_NOT_YET_ASSESSED.cn:
很遗憾，我们的人工智能无法对此进行评估。

我们的查哥查妹🕵🏻会尽快评估这条短信并回复。感谢您的耐心。

LEGITIMATE.en:
{{methodology}}*from a legitimate source*.✅{{image_caveat}}{{generated}}

Thank you for keeping Singapore safe!{{incorrect}}{{submissions_remaining}}
LEGITIMATE.cn:
{{methodology}}的来源是可靠的。✅{{image_caveat}}{{generated}}

感谢您对新加坡网络安全的支持和贡献！{{incorrect}}{{submissions_remaining}}

HARMLESS.cn:
{{methodology}}看似无害。🟢{{image_caveat}}{{generated}}

感谢您对新加坡网络安全的支持和贡献！{{incorrect}}{{submissions_remaining}}

IRRELEVANT_AUTO.en:
Thanks for sending this in.

It seems there isn't any content in this message that we can help assess.

If you do wish for us to assess this, consider resending it with more context, e.g. by taking a screenshot.

Otherwise if you feel we have misunderstood you, please press the button below.{{submissions_remaining}}
IRRELEVANT_AUTO.cn:
感谢您的来信。

这条信息似乎没有任何我们可以评估的内容。

如果您希望我们进行评估，建议您重新发送并附上更多背景信息，比如截图等。

如果您认为我们理解有误，请点击下方按钮。

CORRECTION.en:
❗After a review, our volunteer checkers have determined that this AI-generated response is inaccurate. We apologise for this.

We will send over the checkers' assessment of the original message shortly.
CORRECTION.cn:
❗经过审核，我们的查哥查妹已确定此人工智能生成的回复不准确。对此我们深表歉意。

我们将尽快发送对于原始消息的人工评估结果。

IMAGE_CAVEAT.en: This assessment refers to the claims made within the accompanying message.
IMAGE_CAVEAT.cn: 我们的评估基于图片标题中的内容。

METHODOLOGY_HUMAN.en: Our CheckMates have reviewed this message and think it's
METHODOLOGY_HUMAN.cn: 经过查哥查妹的评估，我们认为这条短信

METHODOLOGY_AUTO.en: Based on pattern matching, our AI is confident that this message is
METHODOLOGY_AUTO.cn: 根据我们的AI技术，我们认为这条短信

METHODOLOGY_HUMAN_PREVIOUS.en: Our CheckMates previously reviewed this message and thought it's
METHODOLOGY_HUMAN_PREVIOUS.cn: 经过查哥查妹之前的评估，我们认为这条短信

REPORTING_NUDGE.en: By sending in such messages, you are helping us notify others who encounter similar ones.
REPORTING_NUDGE.cn: 您的每次查询都在帮助其他收到同类消息的人。

MATCHED.en: In fact, other users have sent this message in {{numberInstances}} times.
MATCHED.cn: 其实查友已收到{{numberInstances}}条同样的短信。

UNSUPPORTED_TYPE.en: Sorry, CheckMate currently doesn't support this type of message.
UNSUPPORTED_TYPE.cn: 对不起，查友目前不支持这类短信。

INCORRECT_SUFFIX.en: P.S. {{incorrect_trivial}}To use CheckMate, simply send us messages that you require checking. We will let you know whether the message can be trusted. There is no need to specially ask about it.
INCORRECT_SUFFIX.cn: 另：{{incorrect_trivial}}使用查友，只需发送您希望检查的消息，无需特别询问。我们会告诉您该消息是否可信。

INCORRECT_TRIVIAL.en: At this point, CheckMate is *unable to answer questions directly, or converse freely with you.* 😕
INCORRECT_TRIVIAL.cn: 此时，查友*无法直接回答问题或与您自由交谈。*😕

GENERATED.en: Do also note that this likely contains AI-generated content. 🤖
GENERATED.cn: 请注意，这很可能包含 AI 生成的内容。🤖

COMMUNITY_NOTE.en:
{{community_note}}

☝️This response was generated by AI on {{date}}.{{submissions_remaining}}

COMMUNITY_NOTE_FEEDBACK.en: Was this response useful to you?
COMMUNITY_NOTE_FEEDBACK.cn: 这个回复对您有帮助吗？

COMMUNITY_NOTE_SOURCES.en:
Here are the sources used by our AI 🧐:

{{sources}}
COMMUNITY_NOTE_SOURCES.cn:
以下是我们人工智能使用的来源 🧐：

{{sources}}

CONTROVERSIAL_DISCLAIMER.en:
This message appears to contain controversial views. At CheckMate, our checks are designed with harm prevention in mind, prioritizing speed and clarity. While we aim to provide reliable results, controversial topics requiring deeper nuance may be less suited to our process.

If you understand these limitations and still wish to view the result, please click the button below to proceed.
CONTROVERSIAL_DISCLAIMER.cn: 这条消息似乎包含具有争议的观点。查友做事实核查的主要目的是快速、准确地判断出有害内容，并防止其更广泛的传播。我们致力于提供可靠的结果，但我们目前的流程可能无法完全适用于需要更深入分析的争议性话题。

NEXT_TIME.en: The next time you want to check or report something, simply forward it in ↗️, copy-paste the text, or send a screenshot 📷 or image 🖼️.
NEXT_TIME.cn: 下次想用查友检查或举报信息时，只需转发短信↗️，发送截图📷，或其他图片🖼️即可。

STATS_TEMPLATE_1.en: {{top}}% of our CheckMates felt this was *{{category}}*{{info_placeholder}}.

INTERIM_TEMPLATE.en:
At this time, {{%voted}}% of our CheckMates have assessed and voted on this message. The majority think that this is {{prelim_assessment}}{{info_placeholder}}. 

NOTE: This is a *preliminary result*. We aim to provide you with a more credible final result as soon as more of our CheckMates have voted, or when 24 hours has lapsed since you sent in your message.
INTERIM_TEMPLATE.cn:
目前，{{%voted}}%的查哥查妹已经对这条短信进行投票评估。大多数人认为这条短信{{prelim_assessment}}{{info_placeholder}}。

注意：这只是初步结果。我们将在更多的查哥查妹投票后，或在您提交短信的24小时内，为您提供最终的结果。

INFO_PLACEHOLDER.en: , with an average score of {{score}} on a scale of 0-5 (5 = completely true)
INFO_PLACEHOLDER.cn: 在0 - 5的评分内，平均投票分数为{{score}}（5 = 完全正确）

INTERIM_TEMPLATE_UNSURE.en:
At this time, {{%voted}}% of our CheckMates have assessed and voted on this message. Unfortunately, our CheckMates either have not reached any clear consensus, or are still unsure how to assess the message at this time.

If you haven't done so, you could send in the message with more context, e.g. sending in a screenshot containing the sender's number.
INTERIM_TEMPLATE_UNSURE.cn:
目前，{{%voted}}%的查哥查妹已经对这条短信进行投票评估。但是，他们无法达成一致，或缺乏足够的信息进行评估。

如果您能提供更多信息，例如发信人电话号码或截图，将有助于我们更好地评估。

INTERIM_PROMPT.en:
Thanks for waiting! Our network of trusted CheckMate volunteers is still assessing your message.

You may press the button below to see how our volunteers have rated your message so far. However, *do interpret this preliminary rating with caution* as the final result may differ. 

We appreciate your patience and hope to deliver the final result soon!
INTERIM_PROMPT.cn:
感谢您的耐心等待！查哥查妹正在对您提交的短信进行投票评估。我们将在足够多的查哥查妹投票后，为您提供最终结果。

在最终结果发布之前，您可以点击“获取初步结果”。请注意，初步结果和最终结果可能存在差异，应谨慎解读初步结果。我们感谢您的耐心，并会尽快提供最终结果！💪🏼

ALREADY_REPLIED.en: CheckMate has already provided a final response to this message.
ALREADY_REPLIED.cn: 查友已经对这条短信做出最终回应。

SCAMSHIELD_ON_DECLINE.en: No worries! We will not send your message to ScamShield. Thank you for sharing this message with us, and for keeping Singapore safe!
SCAMSHIELD_ON_DECLINE.cn: 我们不会将您的短信发送给ScamShield。感谢您与我们分享这条短信，也感谢您对新加坡网络安全的支持和贡献。

INTRODUCTION.en:
Hello and welcome to CheckMate! Press the button below to sign up.

你好，欢迎来到查友！点击下方按钮注册。
INTRODUCTION.cn:
Hello and welcome to CheckMate! Press the button below and sign up.

你好，欢迎来到查友！点击下方按钮注册。

SHARE_TEMPLATE_CTA.en: Share this with others or try CheckMate for yourself at {{link}}
SHARE_TEMPLATE_CTA.cn: 转发给朋友，或点击 {{link}} 亲自试用查友！

INITIAL_ONBOARD.en:
Yes, that's how CheckMate works. You send in a message for checking - we'll do the research and send you a response. By the way, it works for images and screenshots too.

If you like, you can try sending in a message of your own for checking. Otherwise, sign up below to receive free checks each month. 👇
INITIAL_ONBOARD.cn:
查友的服务方式如下：您发送需要查证的信息，我们会进行查找，并把结果发送给您。图片和截图也可以查证。

您可以试着发送一条信息来查证，或者点击下方链接注册，每月可享有免费的查证次数。👇

PLEASE_ONBOARD.en: Complete your sign up below to receive free checks each month, and to view the sources used in each check. 👇
PLEASE_ONBOARD.cn: 完成下方注册，即可每月免费使用查友查证信息，并查看日后回复所用的资料来源。👇

INITIAL_TRIVIAL.en: {{reminder}}To use CheckMate, simply send in messages, links, images, or screenshots for checking. Would you like to try sending your own message?
INITIAL_TRIVIAL.cn:
{{reminder}}若要使用查友，只需发送您想查证的文字、链接、图片或截图。

要不要试试看，发一条信息来查证？

CANT_CHAT_PREFIX.en: CheckMate can't chat with you freely.
CANT_CHAT_PREFIX.cn: 查友无法与您自由聊天。

PRESS_WRONG_PREFIX.en: Oops, not this one! But It's okay.

DEMO_CAPTION.en: Check out the video above on how to use CheckMate. If you have fishy messages on your phone already, you can try sending one in for checking.{{nofishy}}
DEMO_CAPTION.cn: 查看上方的视频，了解如何使用查友。如果你手机里已经有可疑的信息，可以马上发送一条来查证。{{nofishy}}

NO_FISHY_SUFFIX.en: If not, in future when you encounter one, send it in.
NO_FISHY_SUFFIX.cn: 如果没有，没关系！将来如果遇到可疑的信息，随时欢迎发送给查友查证。

SIGNUP_PROMPT.en: If you don't have any messages on hand, you can still sign up by pressing the button below. Then next time you encounter something fishy, you can send it in.
SIGNUP_PROMPT.cn: 如果您手边没有要查证的信息，也可以先点击下方按钮注册。下次遇到可疑的内容，就能马上发送给查友查证。

FOUNDER_MESSAGE_HEADER.en: Message from the founder: Help us help others
FOUNDER_MESSAGE_HEADER.cn: 创办人的一句：帮助我们，去帮助更多人。

FOUNDER_MESSAGE_BODY.en:
Hello!

Recently, I heard from a friend whose in-laws lost thousands to an investment scam.

I'm guessing that like me, you're worried about your loved ones falling for the same fate. Stories like these motivated the team and me to start this ground-up initiative and keep it going since.

You've probably seen some of CheckMate's AI-generated responses. We've developed this capability, and it can help us reach many more people, but it isn't free and right now we're paying out of pocket to keep it going.

If you see value in what we're doing, consider making a contribution at our Chuffed page. Any funds will go towards increasing CheckMate's free tier.

Otherwise, just help us spread the word - hitting "Share with others" sends you a message you can forward.

Help us help others - we'd appreciate it deeply 🙏.
FOUNDER_MESSAGE_BODY.cn:
你好！

不久前，我听朋友说，她的岳父母在一场投资骗局中损失了数万元。最令人痛心的不只是金额，而是受害者在整个过程中始终否认自己被骗，直到一切为时已晚。

我猜，像我一样，你也会担心身边的亲人遭遇同样的命运。这些故事令人心碎，但也正是它们激励了我和团队，在两年前发起了这个由下而上的公益项目，并一路坚持至今。

不过，我们研发的这项查证能力并非免费。每一次查证大约成本10 分。目前，我们一直是自掏腰包来维持服务的运行，但这不是一个可以长期、大规模推进的方式。

如果你认同我们正在做的事，也希望看到查友继续运作，欢迎通过下方链接到我们的 Chuffed 页面做出支持。所有资金将用于扩大查友的每月免费查证额度，更多详情可在页面查看。

如果你暂时无法资助我们，也没关系！只要愿意帮我们转发分享就已经是很大的支持。如果你觉得查友有帮助，点击下方按钮，获取一条可以转发给他人的信息。

帮助我们，去帮助更多人 —— 我们将由衷感激 🙏

FOUNDER_MESSAGE_FOOTER.cn:
陈炳文
查友创办人

ON_SIGNUP_MESSAGE.en:
Thanks for signing up 🙏

If you need a refresher on how to use CheckMate, press "Show me how to use".

Press "Share with others" to get a message you can forward to get others to join CheckMate.

If you'd like to read an appeal from our founder, press "See founder's ask".

Otherwise, when you encounter something fishy, feel free to send it in for checking. That's all😊
ON_SIGNUP_MESSAGE.cn:
感谢你的注册 🙏

如果你需要回顾如何使用查友，请点击「给我演示一下」。

点击「分享给他人」，即可获取一条可以转发的消息，邀请更多人加入查友。

如果你想看看创办人的留言，请点击「听创办人寄语」。

不然，以后遇到可疑的信息，也可以随时发送过来查证。就这样 😊

DONATE_MESSAGE.en:
Thank you 🙏

You can make a contribution to CheckMate at our Chuffed Page, linked below. Any contribution will go towards keeping the service going, and increasing the monthly free tier so everyone can benefit more from CheckMate.
DONATE_MESSAGE.cn:
感谢你的支持 🙏

你可以通过下方链接前往我们的 Chuffed 页面支持查友。任何金额的支持，都会用于维持查证服务的运作，并扩大每月的免费使用额度，让更多人能从查友受益。

FORWARDING_MESSAGE.en:
Share this with others:

CheckMate is a WhatsApp number where you and your loved ones can send in suspicious messages, links, and screenshots for checking.
Watch how it works ☝️

🛡️ Add it to your WhatsApp for free checks: {{link}}
FORWARDING_MESSAGE.cn:
分享给他人:

查友是一个 WhatsApp 号码，您和家人可以将可疑的信息、链接或截图发送过去查证。
看看它是如何运作的 ☝️

🛡️ 点击添加至 WhatsApp，免费查证信息：{{link}}

NEW_USER_PREFIX_EN.en: Hello and welcome to CheckMate! We're glad you've joined us to battle scams and misinformation😊.
NEW_USER_PREFIX_EN.cn: Hello and welcome to CheckMate! We're glad you've joined us to battle scams and misinformation😊.

NEW_USER_PREFIX_CN.en: 您好，欢迎来到查友！我们很高兴您加入我们，一起对抗诈骗和误导信息😊。
NEW_USER_PREFIX_CN.cn: 您好，欢迎来到查友！我们很高兴您加入我们，一起对抗诈骗和误导信息😊。

IRRELEVANT_MENU_PREFIX.en: Our volunteer checkers were unable to assess the claims in this message.😕 Sorry about that!{{generated}}
IRRELEVANT_MENU_PREFIX.cn: 我们的查哥查妹没有在这条短信中找到可以评估的内容。😕{{generated}}

IRRELEVANT_AUTO_MENU_PREFIX.en: Hmm...we couldn't assess the claims in this message.😕 Sorry about that!{{generated}}
IRRELEVANT_AUTO_MENU_PREFIX.cn: 嗯...这条短信似乎没有可以评估的内容。😕{{generated}}

IRRELEVANT_APPEAL.en: Sorry for misunderstanding your intent. We have sent your message to our AI system for checking.
IRRELEVANT_APPEAL.cn: 抱歉误解了你的意图。我们已将你的消息发送到我们的人工智能系统进行检查。

PROCEED_TO_SEND.en:
Nice! Just send/forward us the message. We'll help you check and/or report it! ✅✅

If you like, you can also send in screenshots 📷 or other images 🖼️! This can help to capture the sender's number, or a full conversation, which could help our CheckMates' assessment.

Do note that CheckMate *checks dubious messages and tells you whether you can trust them. It cannot converse with you or answer questions*.

One last thing: by continuing to use CheckMate, you're agreeing to our privacy policy, which can be found at https://checkmate.sg/privacy-policy. In short, we only collect the messages sent to us and your number to facilitate a response!
PROCEED_TO_SEND.cn:
好的！您只需将短信发送给查友，我们会对此进行评估！✅✅

除了文字信息，您也可以发送截图📷或其他图片🖼️！这有助于查哥查妹通过发信人号码或完整的对话内容做出评判。

请注意，查友只评估您发送的短信，它无法与您进行对话。

最后，使用查友即表示您已同意我们的隐私政策。您可在 https://checkmate.sg/privacy-policy 查看我们的隐私政策。基本上，我们只收集您发送的消息以及您的手机号码，以便回复您！

HOW_TO.en:
Check out https://youtube.com/shorts/gFeO_qFOchs?feature=share to see how CheckMate works!

Done? You're now ready to use CheckMate! Let's do our part in the fight against scams and misinformation! 💪
HOW_TO.cn:
了解查友是如何运行的：https://youtube.com/shorts/gFeO_qFOchs?feature=share

准备好了吗？您可以开始使用查友了！让我们一起为反击诈骗和虚假信息做出贡献！💪

LEARN_MORE.en: To learn more about CheckMate, you can visit our website at https://checkmate.sg
LEARN_MORE.cn: 若想了解有关查友的更多信息，您可以访问我们的网站 https://checkmate.sg

FEEDBACK.en: You can submit feedback at https://bit.ly/checkmate-feedback. Rest assured, we'll read it ASAP!
FEEDBACK.cn: 您可以在 https://bit.ly/checkmate-feedback 提供反馈。我们会尽快查看！

DISPUTE.en: Thanks for letting us know! Our CheckMates will review the assessment of this message.
DISPUTE.cn: 感谢您的反馈！我们的查哥查妹将会重新评估这条短信。

CONTACT.en: Here's our contact! Do add us to your contact list so you can find us in future. 😊
CONTACT.cn: 这是我们的联系方式！请将我们添加到您的联系人列表中，以便您以后能找到我们。😊

UNSUBSCRIBE.en: Sorry to see you go.😞 If you change your mind, you can always come back to the menu to subscribe again!
UNSUBSCRIBE.cn: 我们很遗憾您选择离开。😞 如果您改变主意，您可以随时回到菜单重新订阅！

SUBSCRIBE.en: Thanks for subscribing!🙏🏻 CheckMate will now send you content occasionally. Hope you find it useful!
SUBSCRIBE.cn: 感谢您的订阅！🙏🏻 查友将偶尔向您发送内容。希望它对您有帮助！

REFERRAL.en:
Forward this message or share this link with your loved ones! 🤗
 
Getting dubious messages? Check or report them on CheckMate: {{link}}
REFERRAL.cn:
请把这条信息和连接分享给您的亲朋好友！🤗

收到可疑信息？使用查友检查或举报: {{link}}

REFERRAL_PREPOPULATED_PREFIX.en:
Referral Code/推荐码: {{code}}

按发送按钮/Click the send button to get started!👉
REFERRAL_PREPOPULATED_PREFIX.cn:
Referral Code/推荐码: {{code}}

按发送按钮/Click the send button to get started!👉

REFERRAL_PREPOPULATED_PREFIX_1.en:
S/N: {{code}}

Simply send this message to get started! (按发送按钮!) 👉
REFERRAL_PREPOPULATED_PREFIX_1.cn:
S/N: {{code}}

Simply send this message to get started! (按发送按钮!) 👉

BETA_PREPOPULATED_PREFIX.en:
S/N: {{code}}

Enrol me in the new version of CheckMate!
BETA_PREPOPULATED_PREFIX.cn:
S/N: {{code}}

Enrol me in the new version of CheckMate!

GENERIC_ERROR.en: Sorry, an error occurred. 😔 We'll be looking into this! Meanwhile, you can try out other functions of the bot. Apologies!
GENERIC_ERROR.cn: 抱歉，查友出现了错误。😔 我们会尽快解决这个问题！您可以尝试使用查友的其他功能。我们再次为此道歉！

SATISFACTION_SURVEY.en:
Thanks so much for using CheckMate🙏. We're improving the product from time to time, and your feedback is valuable to us.

On a scale from 1-10, how likely are you to recommend us to a friend, colleague or family member?
SATISFACTION_SURVEY.cn:
非常感谢您使用查友🙏。您的反馈对于不断改进查友非常重要。

请问在1-10之间，您愿意向朋友、同事或家人推荐查友吗？

HOWD_WE_TELL.en:
*This is an experimental feature powered by generative AI*. Do let us know if it was useful below!
 
{{rationalisation}}
HOWD_WE_TELL.cn:
这是一项由AI技术提供的实验性功能。请在下方告诉我们它是否对您有所帮助！

{{rationalisation}}

FEEDBACK_NOT_USEFUL.en: Sorry to hear that, but thanks anyway for your valuable feedback!
FEEDBACK_NOT_USEFUL.cn: 很遗憾此功能对您来说不是很有用。 查友已将您的反馈传递给我们的产品团队，以便进一步增强此功能。感谢您的反馈！

REMAINING_SUBMISSIONS_SUFFIX.en: [ You have used {{num_submissions_used}} out of your {{free_tier_limit}} free monthly submissions to CheckMate.{{get_more_cta}}]
REMAINING_SUBMISSIONS_SUFFIX.cn: [ 您已使用查友本月提供的 {{free_tier_limit}} 次免费查证中的 {{num_submissions_used}} 次。{{get_more_cta}}]

GET_MORE_CTA.en: If you'd like more, consider supporting our work via our Chuffed page. It'll help us expand the free tier.
GET_MORE_CTA.cn: 如果您希望获得更多查证次数，欢迎通过 Chuffed 支持我们的工作。您的支持将有助于我们扩大免费使用额度。

GET_MORE_SUBMISSIONS.en: Your free submissions will reset at the start of next month. We thank you for your interest in our paid subscriber tier and appreciate your patience as we work to implement it 🙏🏻.
GET_MORE_SUBMISSIONS.cn: 您的免费查证次数将于下个月初重置。感谢您对我们付费订阅计划的关注，也感谢您在我们筹备上线期间的耐心等待 🙏🏻。

GET_MORE_SUBMISSIONS_NUDGE.en: If you find our service useful, consider joining our waitlist for a premium subscription. For just $5.99 per month, you or a loved one can enjoy {{paid_tier_limit}} submissions while supporting the sustainability of our service!
GET_MORE_SUBMISSIONS_NUDGE.cn: 您的免费额度将下个月初重置。如果您觉得我们的服务有价值，欢迎加入我们的高级订阅候补名单。每月仅需$5.99，您或您的亲人即可享受 {{paid_tier_limit}} 次提交，并帮助我们保持服务的持续运营！

OUT_OF_SUBMISSIONS_SUPPORT.en:
Thank you for your active engagement with CheckMate🙏🏻. Unfortunately, you've reached our monthly limit. This will reset at the start of next month.

If you enjoy using CheckMate, consider making a contribution to our initiative to keep it going, and so that we can expand the free tier for everyone.
OUT_OF_SUBMISSIONS_SUPPORT.cn:
感谢你积极使用查友。
很抱歉，你已达到本月的免费查证次数上限，额度将在下个月初重置。

如果你觉得查友对你有帮助，欢迎支持我们的公益项目，让服务持续运作，并帮助我们扩大每个人的免费使用额度。

OUT_OF_SUBMISSIONS.en:
Thank you for your active engagement with CheckMate. Unfortunately, you've reached our monthly limit. This will reset at the start of next month.

We appreciate your understanding and continued support as we work to serve everyone as efficiently as possible.
OUT_OF_SUBMISSIONS.cn:
感谢您积极使用查友。很遗憾，您已达到本月使用限额。限额将在下个月初重置。

在我们努力为所有用户提供高效服务的同时，感谢您的理解与持续支持。

OUT_OF_SUBMISSIONS_THANKS.en:
Thanks for using CheckMate 🙏🏻.

 You have run out of your {{free_tier_limit}} free monthly submissions. We thank you for your interest in our paid subscriber tier and appreciate your patience as we work to implement it.
OUT_OF_SUBMISSIONS_THANKS.cn:
感谢使用查友 🙏🏻
您本月 {{free_tier_limit}} 次的免费查证次数已用完。
感谢您对高级会员服务的关注，也感谢您的耐心等待，我们正在努力推出该服务。

OUT_OF_SUBMISSIONS_NUDGE.en: Thanks for using CheckMate 🙏🏻. You have run out of your {{free_tier_limit}} free monthly submissions. Want more? Join our waitlist for a premium subscription below - just $5.99 per month gets you or a loved one {{paid_tier_limit}} submissions and helps keep our service running!
OUT_OF_SUBMISSIONS_NUDGE.cn:
感谢使用查友 🙏🏻
您本月的 {{free_tier_limit}} 次免费查证次数已用完。
想要更多查证次数？欢迎加入我们的高级会员等候名单 —— 每月只需 $5.99，您或您的亲人即可获得 {{paid_tier_limit}} 次查证机会，同时也能支持我们持续提供服务！

WAITLIST_THANKS.en: Thanks for signing up for the waitlist! We will inform you when the paid subscription is available.
WAITLIST_THANKS.cn: 感谢您注册候补名单！我们将在付费订阅服务上线时通知您。

CHECK_SHARING_GUIDANCE.en: Press the button below to share this check with others on WhatsApp
CHECK_SHARING_GUIDANCE.cn: 请点击下方按钮，将这条查核结果分享给他人。

CHECK_SHARING_MESSAGE.en: Check out this check by CheckMate: {{check_link}}
CHECK_SHARING_MESSAGE.cn: 来看看查友的这条查核：{{check_link}}

BLAST_FEEDBACK.en:
Did you find this content useful?

If you wish to unsubscribe, type "menu" and select the "Unsubscribe" option
BLAST_FEEDBACK.cn:
是否认为这份内容对您有帮助？

如果您希望取消订阅，请输入“菜单”并选择“取消订阅”选项。

MENU_DESCRIPTION_CHECK.en: Send in messages, images, or screenshots for checking
MENU_DESCRIPTION_CHECK.cn: 提交文字内容、图片或截图进行评估

MENU_DESCRIPTION_REFERRAL.en: Get a message to forward to others

MENU_DESCRIPTION_HELP.en: Find out how to use CheckMate to check or report dubious messages
MENU_DESCRIPTION_HELP.cn: 了解如何使用查友来查询或举报可疑短信

MENU_DESCRIPTION_ABOUT.en: Learn more about CheckMate and the team behind it

MENU_DESCRIPTION_FEEDBACK.en: Send feedback on anything to do with CheckMate

MENU_DESCRIPTION_CONTACT.en: Get CheckMate's contact to add to your contact list
MENU_DESCRIPTION_CONTACT.cn: 获取查友的联系方式并添加查友到您的通讯列表

MENU_DESCRIPTION_DISPUTE.en: Dispute CheckMate's assesment of this message
MENU_DESCRIPTION_DISPUTE.cn: 对查友的评估提出异议

MENU_DESCRIPTION_UNSUB.en: Unsubscribe from receiving content from CheckMate
MENU_DESCRIPTION_UNSUB.cn: 取消订阅查友不时内容

MENU_DESCRIPTION_SUB.en: Subscribe to occasional content from CheckMate

BUTTON_GET_MORE_CHECKS.cn: 支持我们 / 获取更多

PLACEHOLDER_IRRELEVANT.en: trivial, meaning the message didn't contain a meaningful claim to assess.😕
